Human Boring About Feed

Day Five

05 Jan 2016

Another photo taken in the daylight, another photo taken in the park. Today I took a shot of an interesting log, which shows off the macro capabilities of my iPhone 6s+. The sun setting in the background added in some nice colours, especially when blurred.

All my photos so far have been taken using an iPhone 6s+, and edited using the photos app. If I use a different camera, or different editing software, in future, I’ll give details on that post.

Bushy Park

04 Jan 2016

Today is day four of my photo experiment, and the first day I actually remembered to take a photo that was both outdoors and during the daylight.

This photo was taken whilst walking my dog in Bushy Park, one of the largest parks in London. The sun was just starting to set and the clouds turned a beautiful pink colour.

Birthday

03 Jan 2016

Happy birthday to me! I spent the day out in central London with my partner and family, and had a wonderful time despite the rain. We spent lunch in a restaurant in East London called 8 Hoxton Square. The food was excellent, as were the cocktails we had (especially the bramble).

02 Jan 2016

Post number two. This is my second nighttime photo as I’ve been not very good at remembering to take photos earlier in the day. I’ll make sure to set a reminder to take tomorrow’s photo during the light tomorrow.

366 Days

01 Jan 2016

Today is the first day of the new year. My resolution to myself was to be more active on my blog, since I went through all the trouble of getting it up and running. However, I’m not somebody to whom being active online comes easy.

The solution came when I was browsing the web, as it so often does. I stumbled across the Pic: 366 site, where people are encouraged to post one photo per day of 2016 online. For me, this website will be my location.
